communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.  Please provide documents that summarize the number of Suspicious Activity Reports (SAR) that were created or initiated by Fusion Centers in the United States, during 2018 - 2022.
2.  Please provide documents that describe Suspicious Activity Reports (SAR), created or initiated by a U.S. Fusion Center, that resulted in the criminal conviction of a U.S. person, during 2018 - 2022.
3.  Please provide documents that detail or summarize any real terrorism event on U.S. soil, that was stopped or prevented by a U.S. Fusion Center, during 2018 - 2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Winter Calvert

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.  Please provide documents that describe or summarize the meetings that were held in 2021, between FBI Director Christopher Wray and DIA Director Scott Berrier.  Search period is 2021 and 2022.
2.  Please provide documents of any agreement that was signed between these agencies in 2021 and 2022.
3.  Please provide documents that were sent from FBI to DIA in 2021, involving information that will be shared between these agencies.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Winter Calvert
